name: Roboshell Wars alpha
description:
Roboshell Wars is a fast-paced team first-person shooter with different game modes (Battle Royale mode at the moment) based on classes with equipment.

The main feature is the 'outfit' - players must assemble equipment before the match.

The outfit feature allows player to flexibly customize the class of his character, for example:

  • will it be a 100% 'healer' only or will it be a 50/50 'healer' and 'damage dealer',
  • will it be slow, but fortified or will it be with weak armor, but fast,
  • etc...

Having just a few parameters gives a good variety of different outfits.

Discord: https://discord.gg/xDDZqunHDe 

Status: open alpha

How to play

Before play multiplayer match or singleplayer boot camp you must have 1 outfit (equipment) at least.

  1. Click 'Outfits' button in main menu.
  2. Click 'Add' button, set outfit name.
  3. Choose roboshell (like a class in other games).
  4. Choose 1-2 active modules (primary/secondary module) from Stock (weapon/repair/hacking/support category).
  5. Choose passive modules from Stock to improve your roboshell (passive category). Remember: Roboshell's CPU/RAM/Power cannot be less 0.
  6. Click 'Save' button to save your outfit.
Roboshells:

Combat - combat shell with bonus +50% to weapon modules

Tank - tanked shell with bonus +25% to weapon modules

Repair - shell with bonus +50% to remote repair modules

Hacker - shell with bonus +50% to hacking modules (to debuff enemies)

Support - shell with bonus +50% to support modules (to buff teammates)

Module Groups:

Weapon - 3 types of weapon: laser, magnet, electro. Alpha version is long distance with less damage. Omega version is short distance with more damage.

Repair - modules to repair teammates (remote repair) and yourself.

Hacking - modules to debuff enemies

Support - modules to buff teammates

Passive - modules to improve roboshell.

Default controls:

WASD - movement

Space - jump

LMB - use primary module

RMB - use secondary module

Tab - show map F - set squad tag
